#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <string>
using namespace std;
 
typedef long long ll;
 
const ll mod = 1000000007LL;
const int Maxd = 10;
 
int t;
string s;
int tot[Maxd], tak[Maxd];
ll res;
 
int main()
{
    std::ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);
    cin >> t;
    while (t--) {
        cin >> s;
        fill(tot, tot + Maxd, 0);
        for (int i = 0; i < s.length(); i++) tot[s[i] - '0']++;
        res = 0LL;
        for (int i = 0; i < Maxd; i++)
            for (int j = i; j <= Maxd; j++)
                for (int l = j; l <= Maxd; l++)
                    for (int k = l; k <= Maxd; k++) {
                        int sum = i;
                        if (j < Maxd) sum += j;
                        if (l < Maxd) sum += l;
                        if (k < Maxd) sum += k;
                        if (sum == 0 || sum % 9) continue;
                        fill(tak, tak + Maxd, 0);
                        tak[i]++;
                        if (j < Maxd) tak[j]++;
                        if (l < Maxd) tak[l]++;
                        if (k < Maxd) tak[k]++;
                        ll tmp = 1LL;
                        for (int i = 0; i < Maxd; i++)
                            if (tak[i] > tot[i]) tmp = 0LL;
                            else for (int j = 0; j < tak[i]; j++) tmp = tmp * ll(tot[i] - j) / ll(j + 1);
                        res = (res + tmp) % mod;
                    }
        cout << res << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
